summary: A Nord brute follower who specializes in two and one-handed combat. He can be found in the Bannerd Mare is Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[heading] A Nord brute follower who specializes in two and one-handed combat. He can be found in the Bannerd Mare is Whiterun. [/heading]
[line]
[img] http://i.imgur.com/1l0ij.jpg [/img]

[heading] Avidius was born into a wealthy and powerful family in Skyrim. He was to become a lord when he decided to become an adventurer, and help the people of Skyrim as much as he can.
The Dragon Priest mask was obtained when he defeated the great Dragon Priest Nahkriin. The armor he wears came from killing and skinning the Werewolf that was terrorizing the good people of Falkreath. Finally, the axe he bears was taken from the executioner mad with power, after Avidius slaughtered him in battle. [/heading]
_________________________________________________________________________________________
[heading]NOTE: [/heading]In order to have to mask look like how it is in the pictures, you must download this:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15052
author: DOPEdwarf
